Desc.entry: A not-for-profit charitable social enterprise that provides educational learning services to residents in care homes through one-to-one and group teaching sessions. By providing stimulating learning experiences L4A aims to enrich the quality of life of the residents, which has been shown to delay the onset of dementia considerably. These services are provided by volunteers who are trained to become learning mentors and then placed in an appropriate care home to ensure the best possible volunteering experience. L4A is now recruiting new learning mentors for the Sheffield area who wish to volunteer for 2-3 hours per week - please contact for further details. Company limited by guarantee no 06586596.
